授業目的:
The sub-title of this course is - The History of English Literature
The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with the history of English Literature
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the development of English literature and how it has influenced modern language.
授業方法:
Individual work
Pair work
Information for students permitted to take classes online.
The teacher will send the student all the worksheets and the student will read and summarize the worksheet and submit by email. Once per week the teacher and student will meet by zoom to check on progress, discuss the topic and answer any questions that may arise.

評価.教科書Required texts0: No text required. All material will be supplied by the teacher.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note
Homework 30% Participation (this is NOT attendance) - 20%
Mid-term test - 20% Final test - 30%

name: 【300】Culture and Society　８／Culture and Society
